ALIAS: nv_ious ROLE: Cybersecurity Professional STATUS: Actively seeking opportunities â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• Cybersecurity-focused IT professional with hands-on experience in security analysis, digital forensics, and system administration. Champion of the 3rd Annual FCS Cybersecurity Competition with a top 3% national ranking in NCL competitions. I bring proven expertise in Python/C# programming, security tools (Nmap, Hashcat, Wazuh, Velociraptor), and infrastructure management.
